name: Putt Putt World - AR Mini Golf
name_original: Putt Putt World - AR Mini Golf
description:
Play mini golf in a whole new way! Putt Putt World is an augmented reality (AR) mini golf game that you can play anywhere! It brings the best features of miniature golf to your iPhone, iPad or iPod touch device: obstacles, challenging holes, and beautiful AR environments! With five courses of five holes each, you can challenge yourself to be the best AR putter you can be. Unlock courses including Hole in None’s, Up to Par, Mad Aim Fury Green, Bogey Royale and Meet the Putters.

FEATURES
• 10 New Courses
• Over 50 new holes of amazing mini golf action!
• Each hole is uniquely designed to challenge your putting skills!
• Each course has a unique theme such as water, desert and more!
• Special collectibles that give you extra strokes to help you get the best score on each hole!
• Try to beat par on each hole of every course
• Full iPhone X support!
• AR and Non-AR modes!

Check out all the other games from DOD Media Group on the App Store: https://itunes.apple.com/us/developer/dod-media-group/id1303667551?mt=8

Privacy Policy: http://www.dodmediagroup.com/privacy.html
